item.title: Flower Doodles
item.description: Hello, Today, I will show a few doodles I did with flowers and plants, with inspirations from web searches and above all from Creations CeeCee’s YouTube videos. Flower Doodles The idea that CeeCee gives (and which I loved) is to make our own booklet of doodles, that we can use later in compositions. Composition of flower doodles Now, we can turn those doodles into a unique composition. And voil√†!
